name: NEEO
description: Our purpose is clear. We aim to become the a new winner with a new platform. We can dominate platform industry around the world. Motivation? Global Instant Translation Message App: The Internet connects the world together, but the language barrier remains. We have developed the most powerful messenger app that simultaneously translates over 100 languages, and which has been downloaded over 300k times in 178 countries. It Helps to overcoming of the language barrier and opens doors to a bigger market. Profit Sharing? Global e-Commerce App, Game, Radio De-Centralize? Cryptocurrency. The value of a user's efforts should not be changed because of the decisions of interest groups. There is a need for a tool that can be accepted by everyone who participates in the market. Neeo is a cryptocurrency that uses blockchain, and it is the rational and transparent too that can solve this problem. Neeo is the standard of absolute value for the platform we are creating, which is for everyone worldwide. We have created many applications and services that combine. This is NEEO MESSENGER, NEEO Play, NEEO SOCIAL, NEEO Play E, I SELL & BUY, NEEO WALLET, NEEO TAXI, NEEO DUBAI TREASURE, NEEO ROBOT, NEEO RADIO and the development map is still very large.
